thread.title: Freedom's Steven Riad is lehighvalleylive Boys Soccer Player of the Week
thread.title_full: Freedom's Steven Riad is lehighvalleylive Boys Soccer Player of the Week

title: Freedom's Steven Riad is lehighvalleylive Boys Soccer Player of the Week
text:
By Kyle Craig | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 16, 2015 6:40 PM 
BOYS SOCCER PLAYER OF THE WEEK Steven Riad (Courtesy photo) 
The senior forward propelled the Patriots to a big 3-2 win over rival Liberty on Thursday night. 
Riad had a monster first half, scoring two goals and assisting on another. 
He is Freedomâ€™s leading scorer with 15 goals and 10 assists this fall. 
Honorable mention : Sr. MID Phil Astolfi , Moravian Academy; Sr. FWD Gino Boscia , Pen Argyl; Sr. G John Eltringham , Freedom; Sr. FWD John Fritz , Emmaus; Sr. FWD JD Haaf , Northwestern Lehigh; Sr. FWD/MID Tyler Madeira , Parkland; Sr. MID Sam Marshall , Southern Lehigh; Jr. FWD Cooper Moyer , Palisades; Sr. MID Jarrett Nemeth , Nazareth; Sr. FWD Brett Nesfeder , Notre Dame.
